sets.title: Development
sets.tools: Vue.js, Nuxt.js, TailwindCSS, JavaScript (ES6+), SCSS, CraftCMS, GIT, Webpack, GraphQL, Vite
sets.description:
Strong understanding of the fundamentals in HTML, CSS & JavaScript. Working with modern standardisations such as CSS Grid and current ECMAScript.

Day to day I use Nuxt.js but also keen on exploring other JavaScript frameworks such as React, using with Next.js for SSR and GatsbyJS as part of the JAMstack with queried markdown generated from GraphQL. As JavaScript can be utilised on both the front and backend, I am working on side projects to have a working knowledge of the full stack.

I utilise version control and manage my projects with git. Also, with experience of jQuery and industry experience with WordPress theming and page builders.

sets.title: Design
sets.description:
I've worked extensively across the Adobe CC product range, Illustrator is my go-to for vector-based design, also for any illustration work I do. Photoshop for anything pixel based and image editing. InDesign for editorial and layout.

For prototyping / wireframing I use Figma. With the latter, I've found the ability to share my designs and receive live feedback through just a web browser requiring no software beside a browser on the clients end.
